title: Droners
overview: Race to save the planet!Welcome to TERRAQUA, a world 95% covered by water! Team Tikis — Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse — strive to win the Whale Cup, the most extreme drone race of all time.They will test their mettle and compete against the fiercest opponents from all parts of the world. They'll need to pull off the craziest tricks, tap into the need-for-speed, and navigate the most incredible drone circuits ever imagined.Failure isn't an option: the fate of the Tikis' archipelago relies on their victory!
